episodes.title: Talking About... How I Overcame False Accusations
episodes.description:
Lorina Troy Interview | Live Stream |
Lorina joins us again to talking about how she overcame false accusations. She speaks about the false accusations and how she overcame them. Lorina is helping other families not go through false accusations of child abuse.  Laws are being changed and other families being to speak about their false accusations of child abuse. Remember to share and follow to keep up-to-date with all episodes. #selfimprovement #relationships #dating #behindtheshades 

Visit https://www.behindtheshades.ca to book your one-on-one coaching session today
Watch more videos at youtube.com/@behindtheshades and subscribe for more
Spotify for full videos https://open.spotify.com/show/2SeqWFZHDQ3DsSOqpgOqj7
Connect with us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/behindtheshadesfb

*** HOW TO CONNECT WITH LORINA TROY ***

episodes.title: What Is The Impact Of Survivor's Guilt
episodes.description: Andrew & Melody Interview | Part Two | Andrew & Melody speak to us about how cults use religion and spirituality to condition and manipulate people. Melody shares how she spent years in a cult and this started at a young age. She escaped and details the struggles she still experiences. Andrew and Melody speak to other survivors who share their survival story as well. episodes.title: How I Escaped From A Cult
episodes.description:
Andrew & Melody Interview | Full Interview | 
Andrew & Melody speak to us about how cults use religion and spirituality to condition and manipulate people. Melody shares how she spent years in a cult and this started at a young age. She escaped and details the struggles she still experiences. Andrew and Melody speak to other survivors who share their survival story as well.
